description:
* Based on the manga by http://anidb.net/cr1197 [Kobayashi Jin].
http://anidb.net/ch70 [Harima Kenji] continues to like http://anidb.net/ch72 [Tsukamoto Tenma], but keeps on running into obstacles every time he tries to confess his love to her. To complicate the situation, class 2-D challenges class 2-C once again and there is a rumour floating around that Kenji and http://anidb.net/ch124 [Tsukamoto Yakumo] are dating as the school prepares for the cultural festival.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Harima’s still bananas over Tenma, but now she’s setting him up with her sister! The culture festival has Tenma torn over her slacking talent, so Karasuma offers a shelled friend for inspiration.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scramble Reloaded! / Superstar Request! / Scandalous Restart!
Scramble ga Reloaded! / Superstar ni Request! / Scandalous na Restart!
ScrambleがReloaded! / SuperstarにRequest! / ScandalousなRestart!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma’s class can’t stand to lose to Class 2-D, but they can’t decide which project will take the culture festival by storm. Akira hatches a plan to settle the matter: a no-holds-barred game of capture the flag!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakubou / Senjou / Houyuu
Strategies / Battlefields / Friends
策謀 / 戦場 / 朋友

REGULAR.description:
The ridiculous warfare rages on! When Karasuma and the band enter the battlefield, Tenma proves that chivalry isn’t dead. One last showdown on the rooftop will determine the ultimate winner!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beautiful Beast vs. Beautiful Beast! / God of War vs. God of Warfare! / Teacher vs. Student!
Bikemono vs. Bikemono / Gunshin vs. Bushin / Sensei vs. Seito
美獣vs美獣 / 軍神vs武神 / 先生vs生徒

REGULAR.description:
Class 2-C finally settles their festival fued, and Akira is charged as the playwright. Later, when Eri tries to dig up details on Harima’s turn-ons, the tough guy ends up with someone else’s foot in his mouth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Engeki de Bousou! / Sentou de Bousou! / Onigiri de Bousou!
Wild Ideas About the Play! / Wild Ideas at the Bathhouse! / Wild Ideas About Rice Balls!
演劇で妄想! / 銭湯で妄想! / オニギリで妄想!

REGULAR.description:
Class 2-C suffers from culture shock when their role-playing coffee shop struggles to top the Tea Club’s café! Yakumo tries her hand at cosplay, and Tenma has her hands - and mouth - full over Karasuma’s birthday.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hostesses Are Culture! / Comics Are Culture! / Cake Is Also Culture!
Omizu wa Bunka / Manga wa Bunka / Cake mo Bunka
オミズは文化 / マンガは文化 / ケーキもブンカ

REGULAR.description:
The culture festival continues, and the class play is full of colorful role-reversals - and Eri and Harima take center stage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sleeping Beast / Kiss Impossible / Finale
Sleeping Beast / Kiss Impossible / Finale
スリーピング・ビースト / キッス・インポッシブル / フィナーレ

REGULAR.description:
Tenma and the gang head out for a picnic, but someone forgot to pack the food! Harima and Hanai don’t mind roughing it when they turn the mishap into a cook-off challenge. Later, Harima’s on another hunt - for a job.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight, Hunter! / Fight, Eater! / Fight, Part-Time Worker!
Tatakae, Hunter! / Tatakae, Eater! / Tatakae, Arbeiter!
闘え, ハンター! / 闘え, イーター! / 闘え, アルバイター!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma and Mikoto tryout for the new basketball squad, but when the coach turns out to be a cutie, one-on-one training rubs a teammate the wrong way! Tenma’s spot on the team isn’t what she had in mind, either.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bam * Birth of a Girls` Basketball Club! / Bam * If You Please! / Bam * Swing Set of Tears!
Hacchake, Joshi Basketball-bu Tanjou! / Hacchake, Yoroshiku, Sempai! / Hacchake, Namida no Buranko...
はっちゃけ☆女子バスケ部誕生! / はっちゃけ☆よろしく先輩♡ / はっちゃけ☆涙のブランコ...

REGULAR.description:
Tenma takes her own team of renegade b-ballers to the court and challenges Satsuki’s squad to a showdown!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pass! / Dribble! / Shoot!
Pass! / Dribble! / Shoot!
パス! / ドリブル! / シュート!

REGULAR.description:
Troubled Tenma is on the verge of switching classes! The stakes are set when Harima and Hanai challenge 2-D to a game of cards. But is gambling over girls a good idea?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hee! / Hee Hee! / Hee Hee Hee!
Hee! / Hee! Hee! / Hee! Hee! Hee!
ヒィー! / ヒィー! ヒィー! / ヒィー! ヒィー! ヒィー!

REGULAR.description:
Everyone pigs out at a family hotpot party, a wealth of adult videos gets around, and a secret admirer makes a church confession!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Napoleon, Between Life and Death... / Nishimoto, Between Sex and Self Control... / Sara, Between Saintliness and Self...
Napoleon, Sei to Shi no Aida de... / Nishimoto, Sei to Shi no Aida de... / Sara, Hijiri to Watashi no Aida de...
ナポレオン, 生と死の間で... / 西本, 性と志の間で... / サラ, 聖と私の間で...

REGULAR.description:
When it turns out nobody’s around for Tenma’s birthday, Harima kicks into hero mode to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Perfect, Forbidden! / Entry, Forbidden! / Shorts, Forbidden!
Perfect, kinshi! / Tachiiri, kinshi! / Han Zubon, kinshi!
パーフェクト, 禁止! / 立ち入り, 禁止! / 半ズボン, 禁止!

REGULAR.description:
The fast approaching exam week gives Harima the heebie jeebies when he’s visited by the ghost of flunkers past! Tenma spent so much time worrying over Karasuma that she needs a cram session, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furikaereba Yatsu ga Iru / Karasuma no Na ni Kakete / Nazo wa Subete Toketa
When I Turned Around, There He Was. / In Karasuma`s Name. / All Mysteries Revealed!
振りかえればヤツがいる. / カラスマの名にカケて. / 謎はすべて解けた!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma takes the cake as queen for a day, but she’s bummed when her honey isn’t around. Harima has a secret, but decides to cheer her up instead of spilling the beans. Besides, he has similar work of his own to finish before the deadline!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At El Cado... / In America (26f)... / With America (26h)...
at Merukado / in America (26F) / with America (26h)
at メルカド / in アメリカ(26F) / with アメリカ(26h)

REGULAR.description:
Harima’s comic is a hit! There’s a tight deadline for his next issue, but when he’s locked out of his apartment, he can think of only one place to set up shop: in his lovely assistant’s bedroom, of course!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man Shut Out / A Man Left Out / A Man Tested Out
Shimedasareta Otoko / Manekareta Otoko / Tamesareta Otoko
締めだされた男 / 招かれた男 / 試された男

REGULAR.description:
Harima is left out in the cold again when a ticked-off Tenma kicks him to the curb. Mikoto lets him into her family’s dojo, where he finds himself in a steamy seat next to an heiress on the run!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ni mo Shibararetakunai / Mou Gakkou ya Ie ni wa Kaeritakunai / Kurai Yoru no Tobari no Naka de
I Don`t Want to Be Tied to Anyone / I Don`t Want to Go to School or Home Anymore / Under the Dark Veil of Night
誰にも縛られたくない~ / もう学校や家には帰りたくない~ / 暗い夜の帳の中で~

REGULAR.description:
The rumble turns to melodrama when Tenma subs in for Eri while the bride-to-be is indisposed - putting a certain bad boy into a panic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ... Eri no Touhikou / ... Harima no Lullaby / ... Itsuwari no Hanayome
...愛理の逃避行 / ...播磨のララバイ / ...偽りの花嫁
Eri`s Escape / Harima`s Lullaby / The False Bride

REGULAR.description:
Eri has the holiday blues when a part-time gig has her decking the halls with humbug Harima. Later, a slippery penguin dilemma has the Tea Club floored!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baito no Amai Wana / Kyoushitsu no Amai Wana / Celeb no Amai Wana
The Sweet Trap of Work / The Sweet Trap of the Classroom / The Sweet Trap of Celebrity
バイトの甘いワナ / 教室の甘いワナ / セレブの甘いワナ

REGULAR.description:
With seconds left in his deadline and a snowstorm slowing him down, Harima has the bright idea to make a stop at Tenma’s before turning in his manuscript! He’ll need a Christmas miracle to make up for his mishaps!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here, There and Everywhere, Christmas! / A Dash for Christmas! / A Shattered Christmas!
Kocchira Acchi mo X-mas! / Bakushin For X-mas! / Kudakero X-mas!
こっちもあっちもX`マス! / 驀進FOR X`マス! / 砕けろX`マス!

REGULAR.description:
Karen is definitely into Imadori, but only her brother knows she’s into colorful crime-fighters - until his new friend shows up to play! Later, star gazers reflect on romance. Oh, and in the future, even cyborg space cadets have hearts!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: More Than Friends... / Less Than Lovers... / Up Until Then...
Tomodachi Ijou... / Koibito Miman... / Sore Izen ...
友だち以上... / 恋人未満... / それ以前...

REGULAR.description:
Freshman Mai Otsuka has a super secret identity with a super special mission: Magical Girl Mai wishes to confess her love to her heart-throb, Masked Kamen, but she must save him from the Evil Cartoon King first!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ...Sukuran Desu. / ......Sukuran Desu yo. / ......Sukuran Desu tteba!
...スクランです. / ......スクランですよ. / ......スクランですってば!
This Is School Rumble... / It Really Is School Rumble... / It`s School Rumble, I Tell You!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma and the gang enjoy the New Year festivities - well, everyone but the unlucky two stuck in the lion costume!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Dreams. / Lion`s Dance. / New Year`s.
Hatsuyume / Shishimai / Oshougatsu
初夢 / 獅子舞 / お正月

REGULAR.description:
Tenma impresses her friends on a skiing trip, but her high spirits hit a downward slope when she spots a flock around Karasuma! And while everyone else is out, Harima hunkers down to work on his comic - until a friend calls for help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Jumbo / Dream Jump / Dream Express
Dream Jumbo. / Dream Jump. / Dream, uh, Press.
ドリームジャンボ / ドリームジャンプ / ドリームエクスプレス

REGULAR.description:
Class 2-C take a cruise to warm up their winter vacation, but a run-in with a reef puts a dent in their carefree affairs. When high-flying Hanai lands on unfamiliar territory, he runs in to some familiar faces!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minami no Niji no 2-C! / Fushigi no Shima no Yakumo! / Nanatsu no Umi no...!
Southern Rainbow 2-C! / Ya`akumo of the Mysterious Island! / The Seven Seas!
南の虹の2-C! / ふしぎな島のヤークモ! / 七つの海の...!

REGULAR.description:
Harima has a few hoops to jump through for his editor before his comic is complete. When Yakumo can’t help him out, she sends a very special assistant in her place!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s So Romantic, Harima! / Get Published in Zinegama, Harima! / Come On, Harima!
Romantic Da ne, Harima-kun! / Jingama ni Notta, Harima-kun! / Come on, Harima-kun!
ロマンチックだね, 播磨くん! / ジンガマに載った, 播磨くん! / キャモ~ン♡, 播磨くん!

REGULAR.description:
Yakumo gets a spiritual visitor with a hunch about her feelings for Harima! Tenma has a revelation and Karasuma has an accident. The rumble of Yagami High madness continues as a new semester begins!
Source: crunchyroll
